name: LetterboxdLog
description: Log your Jellyfin playback to Letterboxd.
overview: Syncs your Jellyfin watch history to Letterboxd, supporting anti-bot measures and raw cookies.

versions.changelog:
- fix(ci): Add version collision detection to auto-bump logic (a615f7e)
- fix(ci): Standardize version control (remove CSPROJ version) and harden git push workflow (4deccff)
- fix(ci): Use explicit refspec for git push to avoid detached HEAD error (128) (424ea60)
- fix(ci): Target specific project in dotnet publish to avoid solution-level output error (e46351c)
- fix(ci): Update publish workflow to use correct DLL name and sync Directory.Build.props (0231ac4)
- Refactor: Fix build errors, StyleCop warnings, add ignore logic, and bump version to 1.9.2.0 (5da0ed6)
Fix: Compatibility update for Jellyfin 10.11.x (EFCore/User changes).
